import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Switch from "react-switch"; import './Social.css'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css'; const Social = () => { const [btnMembre, setBtnMembre] = useState(false); const [btnNewsletter, setBtnNewsletter] = useState(false); const handleChange = () => { setBtnMembre(prev => !prev); toast("Wow so easy !"); } const notify = () => toast("Wow so easy !"); return (

) } export default Social;
